import classes from "./About.module.css"; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const vtPath = "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGEnHJ3Ojm1Jg/company-logo_200_200/0/1519912733262?e=1687996800&v=beta&t=pHOw0-HVB5aMQDCPVy_HApDMH3VYl9ltFQ3a9FXkevw"; const About = () => { return (

Summary

My passion lies in web development as I view it as a limitless, creative outlet! I have experience working in the front-end using tools like React.js, CSS, and HTML and on the back-end utilizing JavaScript, AWS, and Java.

Education

B.S Computer Science

Virginia Tech

Dec 2022 | GPA: 3.72
); } export default About;
